entry.title: HIGH SURF ADVISORY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
entry.summary: December 22, 2024 2:30 p.m. Covering coastal Douglas County: A High Surf Advisory remains in effect through Sunday evening at 10:00 p.m. for the south-central Oregon coast. entry.title: High surf advisory for coastal areas this weekend
entry.summary: A High Surf Advisory is in effect from Saturday at 7 a.m. to Sunday at 10 p.m. for coastal areas on the south central and southern Oregon coast.

entry.title: Indoor vs. outdoor cyclamen: How to care for your plants year-round

entry.title: Umpqua Lighthouse to participate in Oregon State Park's Winter Whale Watch Week
entry.summary: Douglas County lovers of all things oceanic will be given a chance to see some rare sights over the Dec. 27 weekend with Oregon State Park’s Winter Whale Watch Week, a whale-watching event hosted, in part, at the Umpqua Lighthouse.

entry.title: SENATORS ANNOUNCE FUNDING TO BOOST PRIVATE FOREST MANAGEMENT
entry.summary: December 20, 2024 11:00 a.m. Senators Jeff Merkley and Ron Wyden have announced that the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Forest Service is funding projects that will assist Tribes, nonprofits, and private landowners in Oregon with their efforts to manager forests sustainably and permanently conserve private forests in partnership with the state. Merkley said, “Oregon’s forestlands...

entry.title: STATE ANNOUNCES ELLIOT STATE RESEARCH FOREST MANAGER
entry.summary: December 20, 2024 10:40 a.m. State officials have announced that Darren Goodding will serve as the first manager of the Elliot State Research Forest. entry.title: CITY OF WINSTON BUILDINGS CLOSED FOR CHRISTMAS/NEW YEAR’S HOLIDAYS
entry.summary: December 20, 2024 10:00 a.m. City of Winston buildings will be closed for the Christmas and Near Year’s holidays. City Recorder Cindy Sarti said that applies to December 24th and 25th, and to January 1st. For more information about the City of Winston go to www.winstoncity.org

entry.title: WISH UPON A STAR 12.20.24
entry.summary: Brooke Communication’s and Rogue Credit Union have the final Wish Upon a Star for 2024. Today’s nominees are Justin and Beth. Justin has cancer and getting sick has forced Beth to take on extra hours at work and with their children’s ministry. Help is on the way with Wish Upon a Star.

entry.title: The Rosebud Theatre to host grand opening show Dec. 27
